Formation.Name: Chariot Unit
Formation.Description: Two chariots can form a unit

Reference.Sourcebook: Bane of Kings

Formation.Name: Javelin Storm
Formation.Description: +1 Fight on first charge of game

Reference.Sourcebook: Bane of Kings

Formation.Name: Phalanx
Formation.Description: +1 Fight to front. -2 Fight to sides or rear. Automatically leave formation when less than 2 ranks. Cannot willingly leave formation.

Reference.Sourcebook: Bane of Kings

Formation.Name: Shield Wall
Formation.Description: Start game in formation or adopt formation for one action. Abandon formation for free anytime during activation or automatically when less than a full rank left. -1 Fight, +1 Defence in combats to front. No one may use Wild Charge.

Reference.Sourcebook: Bane of Kings

Formation.Name: Skirmish
Formation.Description: May start game in formation. Adopt or abandon formation for one action. Automatically abandon formation when contacted by enemy. Can move sideways or backwards with no penalties. Gains Shielding(1) while in formation. Cannot use Fire Over or Aimed Fire while in formation. Figures placed 0.5" apart. LOS cannot be drawn through gaps.

Reference.Sourcebook: Bane of Kings

Formation.Name: Square
Formation.Description: May start game in formation. Adopt or abandon formation for one action. Automatically abandon formation when less than 2 full ranks left. When in formation, all facings are considered front. Combat Dice are determined from any one chosen facing. Does not receive -1 TN for full ranks beyond first. Does receive +1 morale for at least 2 ranks. -3 Move.

Reference.Sourcebook: Bane of Kings

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Aimed Fire
SpecialAbilityType.Description: Do not have to fire at the closest unit.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Artillery
SpecialAbilityType.Description: Cannot move and shoot. Can manoeuvre and shoot. Ignores Shielding.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Brace
SpecialAbilityType.Description: -1 Charge when charged.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Champion
SpecialAbilityType.Description: Roll Champion Die in melee.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Charge
SpecialAbilityType.Description: -X TN when charging

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Command
SpecialAbilityType.Description: Units within 6" roll three dice for activation and morale tests. May activate X units within 6" when activated.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Courage
SpecialAbilityType.Description: +X to all morale tests

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Crew
SpecialAbilityType.Description: Number of models operating artillery piece.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Discorporate
SpecialAbilityType.Description: Can teleport 12" instead of any other actions on successful activation.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Engineers
SpecialAbilityType.Description: On successful activation, build a 1/2" high, unit wide temporary fortification directly in front instead of any action. Temporary fortification counts as light cover and defensive fortifications. Engineers ignore movement penalties for moving over temporary fortifications. When in contact with a fortification and on successful activation, spend an action to destroy part of fortification in contact. Cannot destroy wooded areas. Free wheel manoeuvre to increase contact if unit moves into contact with a terrain piece. Split unit over rivers to build temporary bridge by having figures on both sides of river, successfully activating and sacrificing all actions. Any non-Enormous unit can use the temporary bridge. Temporary bridges can be destroyed if the unit successfully activates while in contact with no unit on the bridge and no enemy within 6".

Reference.Sourcebook: Battlesworn

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Enormous
SpecialAbilityType.Description: Max unit strength is 1. Blocks LOS for all models. Artillery roll extra Combat Dice when firing at this model.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Expert Engineers
SpecialAbilityType.Description: Re-roll failed activations. Successful rerolled activations can only be used to build/destroy temporary fortifications/bridges.

Reference.Sourcebook: Battlesworn

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Figures
SpecialAbilityType.Description: X figures in unit

Reference.Sourcebook: Battlesworn

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Fire Breath
SpecialAbilityType.Description: Once per activation, 12" shooting attack with 5 combat dice using model's Shoot. Morale test required for target even without casualties unless target immune to morale tests from casualties.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Fire Over
SpecialAbilityType.Description: Ignore one unit within 3" that has no Enormous or Large models when determining line of sight.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Flying
SpecialAbilityType.Description: Ignore terrain.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Horrific
SpecialAbilityType.Description: -1 Die for morale test vs this unit in combat.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Indirect Fire
SpecialAbilityType.Description: Does not have to fire at closest unit. Can fire at enemy as long as ally can see it. +1 to TN when doing so. Fires over intervening units.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Large
SpecialAbilityType.Description: Blocks LOS for non-Enormous models. Artillery roll extra Combat Dice when firing at this model.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Legendary Hero
SpecialAbilityType.Description: Gains EXP and heroic traits

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathbreakers

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Limited Manoeuvres
SpecialAbilityType.Description: Cannot pivot or about-face. Max 90 degrees wheel/action.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathbreakers

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Limited Movement
SpecialAbilityType.Description: Cannot climb obstacles. Activation roll at -3 when contacting rough ground or 1 hit / figure in unit.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathbreakers

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Magic Items
SpecialAbilityType.Description: Can be given Magic Items

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Monster
SpecialAbilityType.Description: Max unit strength is 1. Always roll Champion Die. Immune to Command.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Nimble
SpecialAbilityType.Description: Ignore rough ground penalties.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Poisonous Breath
SpecialAbilityType.Description: Once per activation, select unit within 12". Target unit must roll 5 dice >= attacker's Activation. Each failure = 1 hit. -1 Fight until end of turn. Does not trigger morale tests.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Regenerate
SpecialAbilityType.Description: +X Health (up to starting) when activated.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Shadowform
SpecialAbilityType.Description: Max 2 combat dice rolled against this unit if no magic weapons. Takes normal damage from spells or magic weapons. Unit with a figure that has a magic weapon can have that figure fight the Shadowform unit using only that figure's stats for attacking. Shadowform unit fights against whole unit as usual.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathbreakers

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Shielding
SpecialAbilityType.Description: Discard up to X combat dice in melee to force front-charging opponent to discard the same number of his own (min 1). -X Combat Dice to shooting attacks from the front or sides. Artillery ignore Shielding.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Spellcaster
SpecialAbilityType.Description: Knows X spells chosen at start of game, Roll X dice when casting spells.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Spellcaster Control
SpecialAbilityType.Description: Can only be added to army with a Spellcaster. Removed as casualties if no friendly Spellcaster on table.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathbreakers

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Stone Gaze
SpecialAbilityType.Description: When activated, must choose visible enemy within 12". Target must roll 1 die >= unit's Activation or take 1 hit.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Uncaring
SpecialAbilityType.Description: Cannot gain Shielding. Auto-passes morale tests vs melee, suffering an additional hit per -2 modifier. Auto-passes morale tests vs non-melee. Immune to Death of an Officer.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathbreakers

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Undead
SpecialAbilityType.Description: Auto-pass morale tests. Immune to Poison Breath and Stone Gaze. Takes half (rounded down) hits from bows.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathbreakers

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Unthinking
SpecialAbilityType.Description: Activates on 1 die. Max 2 dice for activation rolls.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathbreakers

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Waterwalk
SpecialAbilityType.Description: Ignore movement penalties for water.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

SpecialAbilityType.Name: Wild Charge
SpecialAbilityType.Description: Can re-roll one Combat Die when charging. If re-rolled, enemy can re-roll one Combat Die too.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

MagicItemType.Name: Armour of Starsilver
MagicItemType.Description: 7+ save to ignore each point of damage.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age
Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age
Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age
Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age
Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age
Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age
Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age
Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

MagicItemType.Name: Sceptre of Command
MagicItemType.Description: Can activate units up to 9" away.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

MagicItemType.Name: Sword of Flames
MagicItemType.Description: Reroll 1s on Champion Die in combat.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

MagicItemType.Name: Sword of Starsilver
MagicItemType.Description: +1 to Champion Die roll. Roll of 9 does not hit character.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Brace
Spell.Description: Friendly unit gains Brace

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Explosive Ammunition
Spell.Description: Friendly artillery unit's next attack has +1 Shoot and +2 Combat Dice.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Fortress
Spell.Description: Friendly unit received Shielding(3) until it moves.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Gathering of Crows
Spell.Description: Any unit gains Shielding(2) vs shooting attacks.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Lightning Bolt
Spell.Description: Shoot 6, CD 1 with Champion Die vs any unit.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Resolute
Spell.Description: Disordered unit is no longer Disordered.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Stoneheart
Spell.Description: Friendly unit gains +1 Defence.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Sunder
Spell.Description: Unit gains Shielding(-1) (min 0)

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age
Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Confound
Spell.Description: Any unit must pass an Activation roll on one die or have no actions when next activated.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Earthlines
Spell.Description: Self only. Caster rolls one extra die when casting spells.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Fool's Gold
Spell.Description: Any unit must pass an Activation roll or be forced to perform a manoeuvre by the caster.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Glamour
Spell.Description: Teleport friendly unit anywhere visible to caster. If not yet activated, no actions on next activation.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Pathfinder
Spell.Description: Any unit gains Nimble.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Phase
Spell.Description: Friendly unit can ignore terrain during next activation.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Trueflight
Spell.Description: Friendly unit gains +1 Shoot.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Truesight
Spell.Description: Friendly unit ignores first friendly unit for LOS.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age
Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Courage
Spell.Description: Friendly unit gains Courage(+1)

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Crushing Blow
Spell.Description: +1 Combat Die to figure within 18".

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Dispel
Spell.Description: Remove all ongoing spell effect on any unit.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Fireball
Spell.Description: Shoot 4, CD 3 attack vs any unit.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Fleetfeet
Spell.Description: +2 Move to any friendly unit

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Heal
Spell.Description: Once per game single figure within 18" regains 2 Health (max starting).

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Looking Glass
Spell.Description: Spells can be cast from marker placed in visible spot.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Mystic Shield
Spell.Description: Friendly unit gains Shielding(1).

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Shift
Spell.Description: Friendly unit immediately performs a manoeuvre.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Smoke
Spell.Description: Place LOS-blocking smoke (10"x1"x2") wholly visible to spellcaster. Removed on a 10 at end of each turn.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age
Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Battlerage
Spell.Description: Any unit's officer gains Champion.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Fury
Spell.Description: Friendly unit gains Wild Charge.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Horrify
Spell.Description: Any unit gains Horrific

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Immolate
Spell.Description: Friendly unit within 4" of an enemy loses 1 figure (no morale test). Shoot 4 CD4 attack vs enemy unit.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Poison Cloud
Spell.Description: Any unit rolls 5 dice >= its Activation and takes 1 hit / failure (no morale test). -1 Fight until next turn.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Rain of Knives
Spell.Description: Shoot 0 CD5 against any unit.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Fear
Spell.Description: Any non-Disordered unit takes a morale test.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Weakness
Spell.Description: Any unit gains -1 Fight.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age
Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Afflict
Spell.Description: Enemy unit gains -1 Shoot.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Bells of Doom
Spell.Description: All units roll -1 die for activation until next turn.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Blade Mastery
Spell.Description: Friendly unit gains +1 Fight.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Lifebane
Spell.Description: Any unit takes 1 damage. No morale test.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Mud
Spell.Description: Place mud (6" x 2") within LOS of caster. Cannot be dispelled.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Seize the Initiative
Spell.Description: Roll 4 dice for initiative while caster present. Choose two dice for events before rolling.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Sunblind
Spell.Description: Any unit cannot shoot during next activation.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Stolen March
Spell.Description: Friendly unit makes a non-charge move.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age
Oathmark - Battles of the Lost Age

Spell.Name: Bone Shards
Spell.Description: Shoot 2, CD2 attack.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathbreakers

Spell.Name: Death Vision
Spell.Description: Any unit takes a morale test.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathbreakers

Spell.Name: Necrotic Touch
Spell.Description: Inflict 2 hits on friendly unit that must immediately make a morale test as if vs melee. Inflicted hits cannot be regenerated. Friendly figure regains 2 Health (max starting Health).

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathbreakers

Spell.Name: Poison Blades
Spell.Description: Any unit gains an extra hit in melee the next time it causes at least 2 hits. Does not work against units with mostly Undead figures.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathbreakers

Spell.Name: Reanimate
Spell.Description: Skeletal Soldier, Spearman or Archer unit regains 1 casualty. For every 10 on casting dice, unit regains 1 casualty (max 3).

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathbreakers

Spell.Name: Revive
Spell.Description: Revenant Warrior, Linebreaker or Cavalry unit regains 1 casualty.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathbreakers

Spell.Name: Summon Barrow Worm
Spell.Description: Place marker on visible spot not on a unit. Scatter marker (2D10, pick highest). If on unit, move by minimum distance off the unit. If off table, lost. Replace marker with Barrow Worm. Appearing Barrow Worm in contact with a unit immediately attacks that unit otherwise, immediate activation roll. If failed, does not move, else moves towards closest unit (friend or foe) and attacks. Barrow Worm activates at the end of summoning player's turn, moving towards closest unit (friend or foe) and attacking. If activation roll 2 or less or summoner not on table, Barrow Worm disappears.

Reference.Sourcebook: Oathbreakers
